billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Increases to 15% the amount of the empire state film production credit that can be taken against taxes administered by the city of New York
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and chapter 60 of the laws of 2004 amending the tax law relating to providing tax credits for certain costs incurred in film and television productions, in relation to the amount of such credits against taxes administered by cities of one million or more
